contest-event.event-date:
May 10, 1975 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Tournament for Brass Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 4:57 p.m. Feb. 23, 2011, 8:22 p.m. 1 City of Coventry Brass Band Leonard Pepper 2 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson 3 Tredegar Town Band John Childs 4 Brodsworth Colliery Band Ken Johnson 5 Rochdale Band Norman Ashcroft 6 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Alfie Burch Unknown Result Hepworth Band George Kaye Unknown Result Hade Edge Jack Fisher Unknown Result Coventry Imperial Ray Stuttard Unknown Result Agnes Street Band Ernest Ruddock Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Malcolm Simpson Unknown Result Shirland Welfare Band Doug Carlin Unknown Result Warburtons Bakery Band Harry Bentham Unknown Result Stedfast Band Stanley Dyke Unknown Result Linthwaite Silver Band Gordon Pulleyn Unknown Result Vernon Building Society (Poynton) Brass Band Alan Lawton Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band Les Hine Unknown Result Yorkley Onward Band Brian Howard Unknown Result Skelmersdale Prize Band William Lyon Unknown Result Rockingham Band Derek Ashmore Unknown Result City of Birmingham Band J. Bright Unknown Result Gainsborough Britannia Works Band Glyn Lewis Withdrawn Rushden Windmill Band Robert Howard Withdrawn Ibstock Brick Brass Jon Hall
